columns.name: RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The GID for the  rate offering related to the SMC discount as table of values.

columns.name: MIN_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent for minimum cost.

columns.name: L5C_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weights <= 500 lb.

columns.name: M5C_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 500 lb.

columns.name: M1M_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 1000 lb.

columns.name: M2M_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 2000 lb.

columns.name: M5M_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 5000 lb.

columns.name: M10M_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 10,000 lb.

columns.name: M20M_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 20,000 lb.

columns.name: M30M_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 30,000 lb.

columns.name: M40M_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Percent discount for weight > 40,000 lb.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: SMC_DISC_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: An internal sequence number for the different SMC discount entries provided by movement type.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The GID for the  rate record related to the SMC discount as table of values.

columns.name: STOP_ALTERNATION_BREAK
columns.description: Specifies the weight break where the deficit rating should stop.

columns.name: MOVEMENT_TYPE
columns.description: Qualifies the usage of the discounts defined by SMC/Carrier Connect Movement Type. If null, then the discounts provided (by weight break) apply to all Movement Types.  Otherwise - the discounts defined apply to the specified Movement Type - either Direct, Indirect, Partner or Custom.
